title: Antigravity Mastery: From Idea to Deploy in Minutes
title_cs: Mistrovství Antigravity: Od nápadu k deploymentu za minuty
description: Master Google's visual AI IDE for rapid prototyping. Build full-stack apps with Firebase MCP integration, deploy with one click, and learn when Antigravity is the right tool for the job.
description_cs: Ovládněte vizuální AI IDE od Google pro rychlé prototypování. Sestavte full-stack aplikace s Firebase MCP integrací, deployujte jedním klikem a naučte se, kdy je Antigravity správná volba.
learning_objectives: Understand when Antigravity is the right tool vs Cursor/Claude Code
Master the visual canvas workflow for rapid prototyping
Integrate Firebase MCP for full backend control
Deploy applications with one-click to production
Build a complete project from idea to public URL in 15 minutes
